data.name: Home Deco Puzzles
data.detailed_description:
MEMORIZE


Try to memorize where each item has its position and its surroundings.

UNPACK

After a short amount of time all items are put into boxes and ready to be unboxed.

DECORATE

Now decorate the room wiht the items and put each item back to its originally position!



Home Deco Puzzles is a relaxing game about interior decorating mixed into a puzzle game. A room will be shown and after a short amount of time packed into boxes. Now you have to unpack the whole room and place each item back to his originally position. Unbox and decorate four different room types starting with small single rooms, double rooms, penthouse rooms and big Studio rooms. The peaceful soundtrack completes the game into a meditative puzzle experience.

Can you unpack the room and place each item back to his originally position ?
It is Simple, relaxing and fun for everyone!

Features :

  • Four different room sizes with a variety of different rooms
  • Relaxing game experience
  • Train your memory at the same time!

data.short_description: Memorize, Unpack, Decorate! Home decorating mixed into a puzzle game!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: min. Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
